<<<<<<< HEAD
A short catechism declaring the practical use of the covenant-interest, and baptism of the infant-seed of believers being extracted out of two dialogues concerning that subject / written and published by Simon Ford ... ; with an epistle annexed by the Reverend Dr. Reynolds. Ford, Simon, 1619?-1699. Reynolds, Edward, 1599-1676.
[2], 28, [5] p.
Printed by S.G. for John Rothwell ..., London : 1657.
"To the reader" ([4] p. at end) signed: Ed. Reynolds. Reproduction of original in Union Theologcial Seminary Library, New York.
=======
A short catechism declaring the practical use of the covenant-interest, and baptism of the infant-seed of believers being extracted out of two dialogues concerning that subject / written and published by Simon Ford ... ; with an epistle annexed by the Reverend Dr. Reynolds. Ford, Simon, 1619?-1699. Reynolds, Edward, 1599-1676.
[2], 28, [5] p.
Printed by S.G. for John Rothwell ..., London : 1657.
"To the reader" ([4] p. at end) signed: Ed. Reynolds. Reproduction of original in Union Theologcial Seminary Library, New York.
